title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future
resume: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future is a 1987–88 Canadian-American science fiction/action television series, merging live action with animation based on computer-generated images, that ran for 22 episodes in Canadian and American syndication. A toy line was also produced by Mattel, and during each episode there was a segment that included visual and audio material which interacted with the toys.

A toy line was also produced by Mattel, and during each episode there was a segment that included visual and audio material which interacted with the toys.
